meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unpleasant.
meanings.sent1: The unpleasantness of the situation made everyone feel sad.
meanings.sent2: I try to avoid any unpleasantness in my daily life.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected unpleasantness of the rainy day ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The unpleasantness of the bitter cold was like a sharp slap in the face.
meanings.sent5: The unpleasantness of the burnt popcorn lingered in the air for hours.

meanings.sent1: She couldn't stand the unpleasantness of the foul smell in the room.
meanings.sent2: The movie had moments of unpleasantness that made it hard to watch.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected unpleasantness of finding a spider in her shoe startled her.
meanings.sent4: The unpleasantness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.
meanings.sent5: The unpleasantness of the taste lingered on his tongue long after he had finished eating.
